sentences.sContent: Parents need to be fully informed so they can make a rational decision.
sentences.sCn: 父母需要充分了解情况，这样才可以作出合理的决定。

sentences.sContent: I’m sure there’s a rational explanation for all this.
sentences.sCn: 我相信这一切都有合理的解释。

sentences.sContent: It’s impossible to have a rational conversation with him.
sentences.sCn: 不可能和他进行理性的谈话。

sentences.sContent: ...They are always polite and rational people...
...The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home...
...that might have been as rational a way as any to reach a decision...
...many regulations that don't assume people make rational choices have been successfully applied to control alcohol...
...Only in this way can we reduce unnecessary waste and have a rational and pure shopping condition...
...We need to think about the rational use of health care...

words.tran: 理性主义者，唯理主义者
实行合理化；作辩解；合理地思考
使……合理化；使……有理化；为……找借口

trans.tranOther: based on reason rather than emotions
